update.description:
There are some tests that are already fixed or disabled on the default branch (which uses dart6) but that fail on the gazebo8 branch with dart5. I propose to disable them here.

Here is a build of the gazebo8 branch with dart5 installed that shows these two failures:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-gazebo8-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/43/

An ubuntu build of this branch with dart5 installed shows no test failures:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/609/

The CI builds that will be triggered automatically won't have dart5 installed because release-tools needs to be updated. That's actually the impetus for this pull request, which is to prepare to have dart included in gazebo's CI builds.
update.title: disable broken dart5 tests on gazebo8 branch

content.raw:
I was watching at this specific line `[Err] [SimbodyMesh.cc:82] SimbodyMesh is not supported`    
Maybe this is just a warning instead of err. I did see all the tests are OK   

I think this PR makes sense to enable dart for CI testing and I will approve it.
content.html:
I was watching at this specific line [Err] [SimbodyMesh.cc:82] SimbodyMesh is not supported
Maybe this is just a warning instead of err. I did see all the tests are OK

I think this PR makes sense to enable dart for CI testing and I will approve it.

content.raw:
As for the SonarSensor_TEST, it seems to me the symbody is failing the test as well. I built gazebo8 with dart release-5.1 from source. Could it have been fixed in some other branch? 
```
#!bash 
[Dbg] [SonarSensor_TEST.cc:195] Physics simbody paused 0
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.1.64
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:209] ServerFixture load in 1 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
Warning [parser.cc:441] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].
[Err] [SimbodyMesh.cc:82] SimbodyMesh is not supported
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:135] ServerFixture::Unload
[       OK ] SonarTests/SonarSensor_TEST.CreateSonar/4 (1151 ms)
[ RUN      ] SonarTests/SonarSensor_TEST.CreateSonar/5

[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:135] ServerFixture::Unload

[ RUN      ] SonarTests/SonarSensor_TEST.CreateSonar/6
```

content.raw: see this [release-tools pull request](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/431/install-dart-packages-for-gazebo-ci-on/diff) that will enable installation of dart packages by default for Ubuntu CI jobs
content.html: see this release-tools pull request that will enable installation of dart packages by default for Ubuntu CI jobs

pull_request.title: disable broken dart5 tests on gazebo8 branch

update.description:
There are some tests that are already fixed or disabled on the default branch (which uses dart6) but that fail on the gazebo8 branch with dart5. I propose to disable them here.

Here is a build of the gazebo8 branch with dart5 installed that shows these two failures:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-gazebo8-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/43/

An ubuntu build of this branch with dart5 installed shows no test failures:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/609/

The CI builds that will be triggered automatically won't have dart5 installed because release-tools needs to be updated. That's actually the impetus for this pull request, which is to prepare to have dart included in gazebo's CI builds.
update.title: disable broken dart5 tests on gazebo8 branch
